Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play or discard this card, reduce its #yCooldown by #b1. If it is at #b0, activate this effect instead.

Motivate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

~Orb Core.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 orb. NL  NL Gain a bonus effect on your second Synergy each turn.

Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Synergy.DESCRIPTION: A card #ySynergizes if the previous card played this turn was of the same series.

Force Stance.DESCRIPTION: Boost 1 #yForce on entering.  While in this stance, you have +2 #yStrength, -1 #yDexterity, and -1 #yFocus.  Gain 3 #yTemp. #yHP on exiting.

Agility Stance.DESCRIPTION: Boost 1 #yAgility on entering.  While in this stance, you have +2 #yDexterity, -1 #yStrength, and -1 #yFocus.  Draw 1 card next turn on exiting.

Intellect Stance.DESCRIPTION: Boost 1 #yIntellect on entering.  While in this stance, you have +2 #yFocus, -1 #yStrength, and -1 #yDexterity.  Deal 7 damage to a random enemy on exiting.
